00025 using namespace std;

00027 namespace Hypertable {
00028 
00029 String format(const char *fmt, ...) {
00030   char buf[1024];       // should be enough for most cases
00031   int n, size = sizeof(buf);
00032   char *p = buf;
00033   va_list ap;
00034 
00035   do {
00036     va_start(ap, fmt);
00037     n = vsnprintf(p, size, fmt, ap);
00038     va_end(ap);
00039 
00040     if (n > -1 && n < size)
00041       break;    // worked!
00042 
00043     if (n > -1)         // glibc 2.1
00044       size = n + 1;     //   exactly what's needed
00045     else                // glibc 2.0
00046       size *= 2;        //   double the size and try again
00047 
00048     p = (char *)(p == buf ? malloc(size) : realloc(p, size));
00049 
00050     if (!p)
00051       throw bad_alloc();
00052   } while (true);
00053 
00054   if (buf == p)
00055     return string(p, n);
00056 
00057   string ret(p, n);
00058   free(p);
00059 
00060   return ret;
00061 }
00062 
00063 } // namespace Hypertable
